item.title: Two men fell gravely ill last year; their infections link to deaths in the ’80s
item.description: The bacterium is known to live in Mississippi, but the new cases may expand its range.

item.title: America’s fragile drug supply chain is extremely vulnerable to climate change
item.description: More than 60 percent of US drug facilities are in areas with weather disasters.
